disclose.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to make something publicly known, especially after it has been kept secret
disclose.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Some companies have already voluntarily disclosed similar information.

disclose.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to show something by removing the thing that covers it
